scenario_1.persona_desc: A teacher who specializes in creative writing and has extensive experience in grade 8 and above. They have created a variety of engaging and fun writing activities and lesson plans, including writing prompts and story starters. They are experienced in using technology to enhance student learning and have created resources and worksheets for various age groups. They are passionate about helping students develop their writing skills and have a deep understanding of the importance of writing as a creative and expressive form of communication.
scenario_1.thought: As a teacher, I value fairness and equity. However, I also want to ensure that the total amount distributed is maximized, as this benefits society as a whole. In this scenario, both options give me the same amount (400), but the 'Right' option gives Person A significantly more (750 vs 400). While I might ideally want an even split, getting the same amount while simultaneously benefitting another person more appeals to my desire to contribute to the overall good. My experience teaching has taught me that sometimes you have to accept a certain degree of inequality to improve outcomes for everyone.
